text: "Vi är på gång" is a song written by Tomas Ledin, originally appearing as a B-side for the single "Det finns inget finare än kärleken", released in May 1983.Information at Svensk mediedatabas The song later became common at sporting events in Sweden. A later version, Vi är på gång - VM 2006, was appointed fight song of Team Sweden for the 2006 FIFA World Cup in Germany. Tomas Ledin has also recorded the song in English, as "We're on the Beat". ==2006 single== Released on 17 May 2006, and produced by Jörgen Ingeström and Bo Reimer, the 2006 single version peaked at 5th position at the Swedish singles chart. The song received a Svensktoppen test on 11 June 2006,Svensktoppen - 11 June 2006 but failed to enter chart.Svensktoppen - 18 June 2006 ===Single=== #"Vi är på gång - VM 2006" – 3:10 #"Vi är på gång - VM 2006" (arena version) – 3:45 ==Chart positions== {| class="wikitable" !align="left"|Year (2006) !align="center"|Peak position |- |align="left"|Sweden |align="center"|5 |} ==References== Category:1983 songs Category:2006 singles Category:Fight songs Category:Songs written by Tomas Ledin Category:Swedish-language songs Category:Tomas Ledin songs
title: Vi är på gång
